entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning then light snow. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 late in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
